question: know the Holidays can be wonderful in one way and taxing in another.  I am struggling with many issues.  Just wanted you all to know that Sally is still off the soma and having her WITH me this Christmas is making all the other stress seem really small.  There are other struggles, but we are doing phenominal together.  She is more wonderful than ever and our relationship is really blossoming.I hope you all have a wonderful Holidays.  I really miss our time together and am still so very thankful to know you and to have been a part of such a powerful and wonderful group of people.  I miss those that seem to be missing.  I hope you all "randoms" from back in the day, will pop in no matter what your status (clean or not) and give me some love, for I love you all.I have to let you know that with her, I am happier than ever.  It was all worth it.  So, please, don't give up, people.  There is life beyond addiction and it is sooooo worth living.Love you with all my heart!!!Debbie
